title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Zero-CVE Container Images at Scale: Patterns and Pitfalls (MAM215)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模构建零CVE容器镜像：模式与陷阱 (MAM215)
abstract: Building secure container images sounds simple—until you’re managing hundreds or thousands of them. Teams must juggle dependency updates, new vulnerabilities, and delivery pressure while trying to hit zero CVEs. This session covers how to build and maintain hardened images, automate updates, and balance security with speed. You’ll learn practical approaches for prioritizing CVEs, designing sustainable pipelines, and defending against common attacks—all informed by lessons learned operating at scale. Suitable for engineers, security leaders, and anyone working to strengthen their software supply chain. This presentation is brought to you by Chainguard, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 构建安全容器镜像听起来很简单——直到您需要管理数百或数千个镜像时。团队必须在依赖项更新、新漏洞和交付压力之间取得平衡，同时努力实现零CVE。本次会议涵盖如何构建和维护加固镜像、自动化更新，以及在安全性和速度之间取得平衡。您将学习优先处理CVE的实用方法、设计可持续管道，以及防御常见攻击——所有这些都基于大规模运营的经验教训。适合工程师、安全负责人以及任何致力于加强软件供应链的人员。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Chainguard为您呈现。
